snippet.title: Angry Video Game Nerd 8-bit - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
💢 Get the Demo & Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3445490/Angry_Video_Game_Nerd_8bit/
🕹️ Coming to PC, PlayStation, Xbox, Switch, and NES
📜 Get a free AVGN poster: https://retroware.com/search?q=retroware+posters
🎮 Check out all the Retroware titles for 2025: https://retroware.com/pages/games
💬 Join the Retroware Discord: https://discord.gg/jzRdAAaTxG
📧 Sign up for game email updates: https://pages.retroware.com/email-list/

Made for the classic NES and modern platforms, AVGN 8-bit brings the ULTIMATE NERD RAGE into a new, sinister universe filled with platforming levels, classic AVGN enemies, and nonlinear level design.

Retroware is proud to announce its newest AVGN game, built for the NES by Mega Cat Studios, that brings retro gaming to modern fans. Limited Run Games has also been partnered with to produce physical editions–for both modern consoles and as an authentic NES cartridge–at a later date to be announced.

This is an early example of the game. It is very much still in development. Stay tuned for updates and improvements. 

Game Developed for NES by Mega Cat Studios
https://megacatstudios.com
https://x.com/megacatstudios

PC Version Developed by Programancer
https://programancer.carrd.co
https://x.com/Programancer

Published by Retroware
https://retroware.com/
https://x.com/retroware

Retroware Main Staff:
Studio Head - Ryan Schott
Creative Director - Justin Silverman
Art Director - Xander Arnot

Game Key-art and Thumbnail by Philip Summers
https://x.com/heyphilsummers
https://linktr.ee/handdrawngaming

In-Game/Trailer Music by Dino Lionetti
https://cheapdinosaurs.bandcamp.com

Trailer edited by Joe La Scola
https://x.com/joelascola

#AVGN #retroware #retrogames #retro #indiegame
